name: RainbowTube++
description: Hey! üëãüèΩ RainbowTube++ is a simple rainbow effect on any statically red elements in YouTube user interface which also comes with a üåà Nyan Cat progress bar, a üñ± hover effect and a "WATCHED" overlay all of which can be disabled. This style works well with other styles such as Flattube and CleanTube Feel free to tell me what you think and suggest more elements that should be "Rainbowified". This style shouldn't interfere with many other styles. If you aren't about the animated life, you can also try Youtube Custom Color++ without sacrificing any of the setting presented on this style! Made with üíñ by Justin Ikeako.
additional_info: MILESTONE 100k installs! üéâüéâüéâ This has gone much better than I'd anticipated. Thanks again for all the support! MILESTONE Thank you all for 50k installs! üéâüéâ I'm so glad you all are enjoying what I make! VERSION 1.9.1 ‚Ä¢ Restored the reply button on light mode VERSION 1.9.0 ‚Ä¢ Completely reworked the like/dislike animations; they should have more character now. VERSION 1.8.1 ‚Ä¢ Fixed the ugly new "Show/Hide Replies" button ‚Ä¢ Theming now applies to the "SHOW MORE/LESS" VERSION 1.8.0 ‚Ä¢ Added theming to the scrollbar üéâ VERSION 1.7.2 ‚Ä¢ Added the unread notification dot to the list of affected elements ‚Ä¢ Heart outline now adapts to theming VERSION 1.7.1 ‚Ä¢ Fixed the poor contrast of the subscribe button VERSION 1.7.0 ‚Ä¢ Added theming to the "SET REMINDER" button ‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue where the youtube logo doesn't inherit the custom theme color VERSION 1.6.1 ‚Ä¢ Minor fix for the new Flattube update VERSION 1.6.0 ‚Ä¢ Added theming to the compact gray subscribe buttons VERSION 1.5.1 ‚Ä¢ Made the "WATCHED" text color independent of its parent element's text color VERSION 1.5.0 ‚Ä¢ Added watched overlay VERSION 1.4.1 ‚Ä¢ Altered like/dislike animation VERSION 1.4.0 ‚Ä¢ Added Like/Dislike animation ‚Ä¢ Subscribe button has a darker version of the color animation when clicked ‚Ä¢ Other minor bug fixes and animation enhancements VERSION 1.3.0 ‚Ä¢ Added color animations in the live chat section VERSION 1.2.1 ‚Ä¢ Makes sure that background color of progress bar is transparent by default to prevent a box around Nyan Cat (only for iframes, not the actual site) VERSION 1.2.0 ‚Ä¢ Fixed full screen Nyan Cat progress bar ‚Ä¢ Fixed potential overlapping of styles on effected elements ‚Ä¢ Added rainbow transition on volume slider for congruence ‚Ä¢ Added width transition on like bar when active VERSION 1.1.1 ‚Ä¢ Fixed background color issues on like button ripple VERSION 1.1.0 ‚Ä¢ Added color Effect on the like buttons and like bar VERSION 1.0.0 ‚Ä¢ Deployed üéâüéâ
